body: The `country`, `channel`, and `locale` fields aren't exposed in the UI, and so are never used. They are empty in the API because there is no data. The semantics here are that `extra_filter_expression`, `countries`, `channels`, and `locales` are used to create `filter_expression`. In practice, only `extra_filter_expression` has any data.
